verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> he entered <S%G1525><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the synagogue <S%G4864><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> there was <S%G2258><s%> a man <S%G444><s%> there <S%G1563><s%> which had <S%G2192><s%> a withered <S%G3583><s%> hand <S%G5495><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> they watched <S%G3906><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, whether <S%G1487><s%> he would heal <S%G2323><s%> him <S%G846><s%> on the sabbath day <S%G4521><s%>; that <S%G2443><s%> they might accuse <S%G2723><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.
And <S%G2532><s%> he saith <S%G3004><s%> unto the man <S%G444><s%> which had <S%G2192><s%> the withered <S%G3583><s%> hand <S%G5495><s%>, Stand <S%G1453><s%> forth <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3319><s%> .

And <S%G2532><s%> he saith <S%G3004><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, Is it lawful <S%G1832><s%> to do good <S%G15><s%> on the sabbath days <S%G4521><s%> , or <S%G2228><s%> to do evil <S%G2554><s%> ? to save <S%G4982><s%> life <S%G5590><s%> , or <S%G2228><s%> to kill <S%G615><s%> ? But <S%G1161><s%> they held their peace <S%G4623><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> when he had looked round about <S%G4017><s%> on them <S%G846><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> anger <S%G3709><s%>, being grieved <S%G4818><s%> for <S%G1909><s%> the hardness <S%G4457><s%> of their <S%G846><s%> hearts <S%G2588><s%>, he saith <S%G3004><s%> unto the man <S%G444><s%>, Stretch forth <S%G1614><s%> thine <S%G4675><s%> hand <S%G5495><s%> . And <S%G2532><s%> he stretched it out <S%G1614><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> hand <S%G5495><s%> was restored <S%G600><s%> whole <S%G5199><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> the other <S%G243><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> went forth <S%G1831><s%>, and straightway <S%G2112><s%> took <S%G4160><s%> counsel <S%G4824><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> the Herodians <S%G2265><s%> against <S%G2596><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, how <S%G3704><s%> they might destroy <S%G622><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.

But <S%G2532><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> withdrew himself <S%G402><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> his <S%G846><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> the sea <S%G2281><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> a great <S%G4183><s%> multitude <S%G4128><s%> from <S%G575><s%> Galilee <S%G1056><s%> followed <S%G190><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> from <S%G575><s%> Judaea <S%G2449><s%>,

And <S%G2532><s%> from <S%G575><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2414><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> from <S%G575><s%> Idumaea <S%G2401><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> from beyond <S%G4008><s%> Jordan <S%G2446><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> they about <S%G4012><s%> Tyre <S%G5184><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Sidon <S%G4605><s%>, a great <S%G4183><s%> multitude <S%G4128><s%>, when they had heard <S%G191><s%> what great things <S%G3745><s%> he did <S%G4160><s%>, came <S%G2064><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he spake <S%G2036><s%> to his <S%G846><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> a small ship <S%G4142><s%> should wait on <S%G4342><s%> him <S%G846><s%> because <S%G1223><s%> of the multitude <S%G3793><s%>, lest <S%G3363><s%> they should throng <S%G2346><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> he had healed <S%G2323><s%> many <S%G4183><s%>; insomuch that <S%G5620><s%> they pressed upon <S%G1968><s%> him <S%G846><s%> for to <S%G2443><s%> touch <S%G680><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, as many as <S%G3745><s%> had <S%G2192><s%> plagues <S%G3148><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> unclean <S%G169><s%> spirits <S%G4151><s%>, when <S%G3752><s%> they saw <S%G2334><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, fell down before <S%G4363><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> cried <S%G2896><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%> <S%G3754><s%>, Thou <S%G4771><s%> art <S%G1488><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he straitly <S%G4183><s%> charged <S%G2008><s%> them <S%G846><s%> that <S%G3363><s%> they should <S%G4160><s%> not <S%G3363><s%> make <S%G4160><s%> him <S%G846><s%> known <S%G5318><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he goeth up <S%G305><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> a mountain <S%G3735><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> calleth <S%G4341><s%> unto him whom <S%G3739><s%> he <S%G846><s%> would <S%G2309><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> they came <S%G565><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he ordained <S%G4160><s%> twelve <S%G1427><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> they should be <S%G5600><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> he might send <S%G649><s%> them <S%G846><s%> forth <S%G649><s%> to preach <S%G2784><s%>,
And <S%G2532><s%> to have <S%G2192><s%> power <S%G1849><s%> to heal <S%G2323><s%> sicknesses <S%G3554><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> to cast out <S%G1544><s%> devils <S%G1140><s%>:
And <S%G2532><s%> Simon <S%G4613><s%> he surnamed <S%G2007><s%> <S%G3686><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%>;

And <S%G2532><s%> James <S%G2385><s%> the son <S%G3588><s%> of Zebedee <S%G2199><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> the brother <S%G80><s%> of James <S%G2385><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> he surnamed <S%G2007><s%> <S%G3686><s%> them <S%G846><s%> Boanerges <S%G993><s%>, which is <S%G3603><s%>, The sons <S%G5207><s%> of thunder <S%G1027><s%>:

And <S%G2532><s%> Andrew <S%G406><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> Philip <S%G5376><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> Bartholomew <S%G918><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> Matthew <S%G3156><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> Thomas <S%G2381><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> James <S%G2385><s%> the son <S%G3588><s%> of Alphaeus <S%G256><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> Thaddaeus <S%G2280><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> Simon <S%G4613><s%> the Canaanite <S%G2581><s%>,

And <S%G2532><s%> Judas <S%G2455><s%> Iscariot <S%G2469><s%>, which <S%G3739><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> betrayed <S%G3860><s%> him <S%G846><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> they went <S%G2064><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> an house <S%G3624><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the multitude <S%G3793><s%> cometh together <S%G4905><s%> again <S%G3825><s%>, so that <S%G5620><s%> they <S%G846><s%> could <S%G1410><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> so much as <S%G3383><s%> eat <S%G5315><s%> bread <S%G740><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> when his <S%G846><s%> friends <S%G3844><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> of it, they went out <S%G1831><s%> to lay hold <S%G2902><s%> on him <S%G846><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> they said <S%G3004><s%> <S%G3754><s%>, He is beside himself <S%G1839><s%>.

¶ And <S%G2532><s%> the scribes <S%G1122><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> came down <S%G2597><s%> from <S%G575><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2414><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> <S%G3754><s%>, He hath <S%G2192><s%> Beelzebub <S%G954><s%> <S%G3754><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> the prince <S%G758><s%> of the devils <S%G1140><s%> casteth he out <S%G1544><s%> devils <S%G1140><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he called <S%G4341><s%> them <S%G846><s%> unto him, and said <S%G3004><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> parables <S%G3850><s%>, How <S%G4459><s%> can <S%G1410><s%> Satan <S%G4567><s%> cast out <S%G1544><s%> Satan <S%G4567><s%> ?

And <S%G2532><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> a kingdom <S%G932><s%> be divided <S%G3307><s%> against <S%G1909><s%> itself <S%G1438><s%> , that <S%G1565><s%> kingdom <S%G932><s%> cannot <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1410><s%> stand <S%G2476><s%> .

And <S%G2532><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> a house <S%G3614><s%> be divided <S%G3307><s%> against <S%G1909><s%> itself <S%G1438><s%> , that <S%G1565><s%> house <S%G3614><s%> cannot <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1410><s%> stand <S%G2476><s%> .

And <S%G2532><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> Satan <S%G4567><s%> rise up <S%G450><s%> against <S%G1909><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> be divided <S%G3307><s%> , he cannot <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1410><s%> stand <S%G2476><s%> , but <S%G235><s%> hath <S%G2192><s%> an end <S%G5056><s%> .

No man <S%G3762><s%> can <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1410><s%> enter <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> a strong man's <S%G2478><s%> house <S%G3614><s%> , and spoil <S%G1283><s%> his <S%G846><s%> goods <S%G4632><s%> , except <S%G3362><s%> he will <S%G1210><s%> first <S%G4412><s%> bind <S%G1210><s%> the strong man <S%G2478><s%> ; and <S%G2532><s%> then <S%G5119><s%> he will spoil <S%G1283><s%> his <S%G846><s%> house <S%G3614><s%> .

Verily <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%> <S%G3754><s%> , All <S%G3956><s%> sins <S%G265><s%> shall be forgiven <S%G863><s%> unto the sons <S%G5207><s%> of men <S%G444><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> blasphemies <S%G988><s%> wherewith <S%G3745><s%> soever <S%G302><s%> they shall blaspheme <S%G987><s%> :

But <S%G1161><s%> he <S%G3739><s%> that <S%G302><s%> shall blaspheme <S%G987><s%> against <S%G1519><s%> the Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost <S%G4151><s%> hath <S%G2192><s%> never <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1519><s%> <S%G165><s%> forgiveness <S%G859><s%> , but <S%G235><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> in danger <S%G1777><s%> of eternal <S%G166><s%> damnation <S%G2920><s%> :
Because <S%G3754><s%> they said <S%G3004><s%>, He hath <S%G2192><s%> an unclean <S%G169><s%> spirit <S%G4151><s%>.

¶ There came <S%G2064><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> his <S%G846><s%> brethren <S%G80><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> his mother <S%G3384><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%>, standing <S%G2476><s%> without <S%G1854><s%>, sent <S%G649><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, calling <S%G5455><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the multitude <S%G3793><s%> sat <S%G2521><s%> about <S%G4012><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, and <S%G1161><s%> they said <S%G2036><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, Behold <S%G2400><s%>, thy <S%G4675><s%> mother <S%G3384><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> brethren <S%G80><s%> without <S%G1854><s%> seek for <S%G2212><s%> thee <S%G4571><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he answered <S%G611><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%>, Who <S%G5101><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> mother <S%G3384><s%> , or <S%G2228><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> brethren <S%G80><s%> ?

And <S%G2532><s%> he looked <S%G4017><s%> round about <S%G2945><s%> on them which <S%G3588><s%> sat <S%G2521><s%> about <S%G4012><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, and said <S%G3004><s%>, Behold <S%G2396><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> mother <S%G3384><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> brethren <S%G80><s%> !

For <S%G1063><s%> whosoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> shall do <S%G4160><s%> the will <S%G2307><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> , the same <S%G3778><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> brother <S%G80><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> sister <S%G79><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> mother <S%G3384><s%> .
